entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Sackville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:14 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nappan AAFC 07:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: NNE 26 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of freezing drizzle. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries this morning. Ice pellets mixed with snow beginning late this afternoon. Fog patches this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow changing to freezing rain this evening. Rain along the Fundy coast before morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the morning. Rain along the Fundy coast early in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the Strait. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
